#Traffic Table

= Introduction =

Traffic table stores data which is related with netflow and snort alert.


= Tables =

|| Row Key                    || Column Family (bytes)    || Columm Family (packets) || Column Family (alert) ||
|| Timestamp_<Monitoring IP>  || bytes:<dst IP> => nn,mm || packets:<dst IP> => nn,mm || alert:<dst IP> => signature # or contents ||
|| 1334018704_10.63.239.236 || B:223.4.119.42 => 181448,107282 || P:223.4.119.42 => 1110,1066 || ||

for example, we have fllowing netflow data:
10.63.239.236_223.4.119.42      181448 107282 1110 1066

|| monitoring IP  || 10.63.239.236 ||
|| destination IP || 223.4.119.42  ||
|| sent bytes     || 181448        ||
|| receive bytes  || 107282        ||
|| sent packets   || 1110          ||
|| receive packets|| 1066          ||
